function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Intensified recreational activity in urban periphery","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to higher population density in urban periphery","Mitigation":"Promote safe recreational activities with social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Public health messaging, signage for social distancing","People":"Residents of urban periphery, visitors to urban periphery","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Greater pedestrian activity in green spaces and parks","Impact":"Potential overcrowding and increased risk of close contact in green spaces","Mitigation":"Monitor and regulate capacity in parks and green spaces, encourage staggered visitation times","Technologies":"Capacity monitoring technology, park reservation system","People":"Pedestrians, park visitors","Owner":"Park management, local government"},{"Description":"Interrupted weekly rhythm of recreational activity","Impact":"Disruption of regular patterns may lead to unpredictable crowd behavior and non-compliance with social distancing guidelines","Mitigation":"Provide alternative safe recreational options, reinforce messaging for consistent adherence to guidelines","Technologies":"Mobile apps for safe recreational options, constant communication channels for updates","People":"Residents affected by interrupted rhythm","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"}]}
